scripts.allure:clear: if exist cypress\reports\allure-results rmdir /q /s cypress\reports\allure-results && if exist cypress\reports\allure-report rmdir /q /s cypress\reports\allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.test-wip: npm run allure:clear && npm run cy:run:wip && npm run allure:report
scripts.test: npm run allure:clear && npm run cy:run:all && npm run allure:report
scripts.test-stratasphere: npm run allure:clear && npm run cy:run:stratasphere && npm run allure:report
scripts.test-arfp: npm run allure:clear && npm run cy:run:arfp && npm run allure:report
